about_the_game:
Ignite your strategy with Starfire Skies, where every card creates a breathtaking fireworks display!


In this captivating roguelike deckbuilder, use your fireworks to entertain and meet the demands of your audience. Explore the bustling market square, collect powerful artifacts, and craft the perfect deck to leave your spectators in awe!

Build your deck

Open unique card packs that change with each run, and select the best cards to enhance your deck. Tailor your strategy by building powerful synergies and creating dazzling fireworks combinations for each show.

Discover Market Square

Shape your adventure through the choices you make in mysterious events discovered during your night out in the square. Each decision impacts your run, defining your path to success.

Features

  • Powerful Deckbuilding: Collect cards that build stronger synergies as you prepare for each show.

  • Strategic Card Play: Play cards wisely to impress your audience and deliver unforgettable finales.

  • Unique Rewards: Earn artifacts and card rewards from the audience that make future performances even more spectacular.

  • 50+ Unique Cards: Discover a wide range of fireworks to customize your displays.

  • 12 Distinct Audience Members: Each inspired by an animal from the Chinese Zodiac, adding variety to every performance.

  • 12+ Events: Encounter diverse events that challenge your choices and strategies.

  • Multiple Starting Decks: Choose from 3+ different starting decks to fit your playstyle.

  • Challenging Bosses & Elites: Test your deckbuilding skills against 6 unique bosses and 12 elite enemies.

Watch Your Firework Show

Once you've built the perfect deck, sit back and enjoy the stunning fireworks display you've crafted. Amaze your audience, collect rewards, and get ready for the next show!
